document.full_text: president barack obama will visit facebook's california headquarters on april 20 and hold a town hall forum on the economy with facebook chief executive mark zuckerberg and chief operating officer sheryl sandberg, the white house said on tuesday.
document.title: obama links to facebook for economy townhall
lines_and_colors: president barack obama will visit facebook's california headquarters on april 20 and hold a town hall forum on the economy with facebook chief executive mark zuckerberg and chief operating officer sheryl sandberg, the white house said on tuesday.
